name: 陳怡倩
objective: This course aims at introducing fundamental qualitative and quantitative research methods. Learners will be provided with an introductory foundation in qualitative and quantitative research design that enables them to become competent researchers of both studies.
schedule:
Week 1 Course Introduction	
Week 2 Library Resources; Ethics in Research	
Week 3 Qualitative Research Design
Week 4 Qualitative Data	        
Week 5 QRD I: Biographical Study	        
Week 6 QRD II: Phenomenological Study	        
Week 7 QRD III: Ethnological Study
Week 8 QRD IV: Case Study	        
Week 9 Qualitative Study Presentations	
Week 10 Quantitative Research 
Week 11 Quantitative Data 
Week 12 Quantitative Research Design I: Paired T-test Study
Week 13 Quantitative Research Design II: Independent T-test Study
Week 14 Quantitative Research Design III: Correlation Study
Week 15 Quantitative Study Presentations       
Week 16 TBA      
Week 17 Final Project Due; Final Project Presentations I       	         
Week 18 Final Project Presentations  II
scorePolicy: Attendance & active participation (15%), study presentations (20%), class assignments (25%); final project & presentation (40%)
remarks: Please log in to TEAMS using your @cc.ntut.edu.tw account, and you would be able to join the class TEAMS there.
